addr-type.help: Address type of the remote ICAP server: IPv4, IPv6 or FQDN.
addr-type.name: addr-type

options.help: Use an IPv4 address for the remote ICAP server.
options.name: ip4

options.help: Use an IPv6 address for the remote ICAP server.
options.name: ip6

options.help: Use the FQDN for the forwarding proxy server.
options.name: fqdn

fqdn.help: ICAP remote server Fully Qualified Domain Name (FQDN).
fqdn.name: fqdn

healthcheck.help: Enable/disable ICAP remote server health checking. Attempts to connect to the remote ICAP server to verify that the server is operating normally.
healthcheck.name: healthcheck

healthcheck-service.help: ICAP Service name to use for health checks.
healthcheck-service.name: healthcheck-service

ip-address.help: IPv4 address of the ICAP server.
ip-address.name: ip-address

ip6-address.help: IPv6 address of the ICAP server.
ip6-address.name: ip6-address

max-connections.help: Maximum number of concurrent connections to ICAP server. Must not be less than wad-worker-count.
max-connections.name: max-connections

secure.help: Enable/disable secure connection to ICAP server.
secure.name: secure

options.help: Disable connection to secure ICAP server.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable connection to secure ICAP server.
options.name: enable
